name: FOREST DONGMUL
description:
Lured by curiosity, three cute animals try to find their way through a maze-like thick forest.
Try to find your way back home to the FOREST.
A short game, expected 10-15 minutes of gameplay.

Top Down 2D Pixelated Graphics

- Explore maps (use WASD to move)
- Dialogues
- Animated Scene
- Turn-based combat (against enemy)
ㄴ Simple combat (Attack, Special Attack, Heal, Body Shield)
- Critical hit system implemented for combat variability

(Will update much more story-related content soon)
